name: Sunken City
description: The ruins of an ancient underwater city have been
revealed by receding waters in the deep ocean.
Dive into the depths and explore the mysteries

objectives.descend_to_ruins: Descend to the Sunken City Ruins

dialogs.start1: The legends speak of a great city beneath the waves.
dialogs.start2: Now the tides have revealed what was long hidden.
dialogs.start3: Join me in exploring this underwater marvel!
dialogs.progress1: The architecture is breathtaking... even underwater.
dialogs.progress2: These pearls still glow with ancient magic!
dialogs.complete1: We've recovered treasures lost for millennia!
dialogs.complete2: The sunken city's secrets will rewrite history books.
